name: Mystic Seer
description:
A chilling look back at a time where we enslaved ourselves between fear and superstition. Is the Mystic Seer always correct? Does he really know the future? Ask your Yes or No question, but beware the answer that lies ahead of you. Sound effects, vibration, and animation make this a wonderful entertainment piece.

Now, this popular app is available for free. All we ask is that you consider our other applications, such as our award winning Tip Calculator: Tips, our popular Finger Scan toy, or our useful My Shows tracking guide or our ad-hoc trivia tool Buzzer! We have lots of apps and would appreciate your support! Click on the Kudit link to see all our offerings.
